name: Get Yeetin'
description:
Get ready for the adventure of your lifetime with a slightly messed up UI.

[IMPORTANT]

There is a chance that the doors in some levels will randomly fail to operate. This can be fixed by reloading the page (you will lose your progress, but the game is only about five minutes long for those of you who want to make it to the end).

[IMPORTANT]

[NOTICE]

It is recommended to play the game in Full Screen mode when playing the Web version.
The Mac and Linux versions of the game are untested — if one of them does not run, please notify me!

[NOTICE]

###### =- The Things You Need to Know -= ######

- Controls: -

A  -  Move Left.

D  -  Move Right.

W  -  Jump.

Left Click  -  Yeet Rocks At People.

Enjoy!

P.S.
I have no idea why the frame rate is sometimes less than it should be.
I also totally accidentally left in the "Controls" button (it does nothing and isn't supposed to be there). :>

P.S.S.
A huge shutout and thanks to the community for selecting this game to be the 1st place winner of the FTGD Game Jam! I am humbled to see my game selected for such an honor. <3

(Made in 48 hours as part of the Full-Time Game Dev Game Jam. Theme: "The Golden Rule").

###### =- Other Unnecessary Information -= ######

Get Yeetin' is my first-ever Game Jam project and — interestingly — my first "commercial" project (if one could even call it that).

Get Yeetin' had many bumps during its development. The first 24 hours worth of work had to be scrapped due to the original project just not being fun. Luckily, some code was able to be salvaged! Which honestly is the only reason I was able to finish the project.

One of my goals for this project was to start entirely fresh. Being an individual who likes to do things the 'right' way (which usually is never  the fastest way), I tend to love making ridiculously over-engineered systems. When Full-Time Game Dev announced that there was to be an upcoming Game Jam — I knew I had to participate to get some much needed perspective and to free myself of my current development nightmare.

Get Yeetin' is an (albeit slightly laggy) game made from the necessity to break my game-dev habits. I really took off the reigns for this project and just let myself run as fast as possible.

I hope you enjoy it!
